author: LISA MASCARO AP Congressional Correspondent
title: For McConnell, virus carries echo of his boyhood polio
description: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell flashes back to an earlier crisis.
content:
WASHINGTON -- 
Mitch McConnells earliest childhood memory is the day he left the polio treatment center at Warm Springs, Georgia, for the last time.
He was just a toddler in 1944, when his father was deployed to World War II, his mother relocated the family… [+5477 chars]
